thread.title: Are you ready for a reality show about underwear designer Andrew Christian?
thread.title_full: Are you ready for a reality show about underwear designer Andrew Christian?

author: Derek de Koff
title: Are you ready for a reality show about underwear designer Andrew Christian?
text:
Andrew Christian, the designer behind the most presumptuously pouched underwear known to man, is getting his own reality show. 
“Have you ever wondered what it’s like to be surrounded by underwear models all day?” Christian asks haltingly, flanked by adult stars Topher DiMaggio and Arad Winwin. 
Related: Bodybuilder/underwear model Arad Winwin opens up about fleeing Iran and his time in Turkish jail 
What are the behind-the-scenes workings of a real-life underwear company? Who’s sleeping with who? What’s wrong with that guy who’s all “ Don’t think I’m that kind of bitch, because I’m not! “? And most importantly, why are all the model’s briefs blurred out? 
Related: David Rest Posing With Arad Winwin Is A Win/Win If We’ve Ever Seen One 
All these questions and more will be answered when Model Behavior actually sees the light of day. 
Until then, here’s the trailer:
